full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` DPAL LDAN DMAG ZOR GYI RGYAL MO GTZO BOR GYUR BA'I 'JIG RTEN DANG 'JIG RTEN LAS 'DAS PA'I MKHA' 'GRO'I BKA' CHANG DANG DAM TSIG NYAMS CHAGS GRIB DANG ME GTZANG BA THAMS CAD SEL BA'I CHED DU KHRUS GSOL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI DPAL LDAN DMAG ZOR GYI RGYAL MO GTZO BOR GYUR BA'I 'JIG RTEN DANG 'JIG RTEN LAS 'DAS PA'I MKHA' 'GRO MA RNAMS KYI BKA' CHANG DU DAM TSIG NYAMS CHAGS GRIB DANG MI GTZANG BA THAMS CAD SEL BA'I CHED DU KHRUS GSOL BYA BA 'DI NI, RJE LHA LUNG DPAL RDO RJES RGYAL PO SDIG CAN BKROD DUS GRIB SEL DU MDZAD PA YANG CUNG ZAD KHA BSKANG BYAS NAS SID DHI'I MING CAN GYIS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA, 'GRO BA SEMS CAN THAMS CAD LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
